title: Next Generation Science Standards: For States, By States
driving_question: How can we understand and apply the Next Generation Science Standards for effective science education in our states?
tasks: Read the Next Generation Science Standards
Understand the arrangement of standards by Disciplinary Core Ideas and by Topics
Examine the connections to standards arranged by Disciplinary Core Ideas and by Topics
Explore the conceptual shifts in the Next Generation Science Standards
Review responses to the public drafts
Understand the implications for college and career
pre_thinking_prompts: What do you know about the Next Generation Science Standards?
Why is it important to understand these standards?
How can these standards be applied in your local context?
reflection_prompt: Reflect on how the Next Generation Science Standards can be implemented in your local context for effective science education.
ai_tutor_prompts: Let's discuss the key points in the Next Generation Science Standards.
How do you think these standards can be applied in your local context?
What are the conceptual shifts in these standards?
remix_zone: Consider how you might adapt these standards for your own educational context. What modifications would you make?
